Text.Page:
I can't decide what's worseâ€”not feeling my toes or these reports that the {@LinkCreature:34#1100#icewalker barsicores} have struck another prospecting team.

The ice must flow, so get out there and kill the barsicores. I'm going to ask the arcanists to enchant my socks.

Barsicores are awful creatures. The giants like to use them as skirmishers and the devas use them as distractions.

I just want to use them as lifelike ice statues.

Obviously I can't go kill the barsicores. My toes would break off and then where would I be?

Limping, that's where!
